parameters.name: options.disabled
parameters.description: Disables the file input. Default: false.

parameters.name: options.multiple
parameters.description: Allows selecting more than one file. Default: false.

returnValues.name: files
returnValues.description: Array of currently selected File objects.

returnValues.name: hasFiles
returnValues.description: Utility boolean that is true if at least one file is selected.

returnValues.name: inputProps
returnValues.description: Props to be spread onto a <input type='file' /> element.

returnValues.name: reset
returnValues.description: Function to clear the current selection.

returnValues.name: setFiles
returnValues.description: Manual setter for files (ideal for Drag & Drop implementations).
